data.actual_result: You see the "Welcome to the beginning of the channel" message until you send a message
data.expected_result: The "Load more messages" bar appears when all messages are purged
data.short_description: Clearing all loaded messages in a channel you're currently viewing shows new channel message until you send a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel with a bot that can purge messages (I used Nadeko) - Purge the 50 loaded messages in the channel - Observe what you see in the channel - Send a message and observe the channel again
